long_description: If you're an all-mountain rider happy to ride the park and the steeps, choose the Salomon Mirage snowboard bindings. Cushioned baseplates damp your landings while adjustable highbacks dial in the fit. ShadowFit baseplates have an anatomic fit and flexible heel loop to provide mobility, performance and comfort; Kevlar(R) Quickwire supports around heels provide strength. Adjustable toe ramps offer you the best possible control and power on your toe edge; integrated mounting system keeps all your hardware in place when adjusting bindings. Full EVA baseplate padding dampens vibrations and cushion landings. Mirage highbacks feature a unique flex pattern and asymmetric shape specifcally designed for women; integrated foward lean; highbacks can be rotated. 3D, asymmetric ankle straps prevent pressure points while offering a secure fit; toe straps grip boots to lock your feet in. Micro adjustments on straps let you lengthen or shorten straps for an optimal fit. Powerglide aluminum buckles are lightweight and easy to operate. Universal discs are compatible with all existing mounting systems including the Burton Channel system.
